entry.value: select list_date from (select date_format( adddate((select IFNULL(max(hist.diary_day),'2018-11-07') from SLEEP_HISTORY hist), @num:=@num+1), '%Y-%m-%d' ) list_date from GENERATOR, (select @num:=-1) num limit 150) dates where list_date < CURRENT_DATE()

INSERT INTO SLEEP_HISTORY (DIARY_DAY, TOTAL_MINUTES_ASLEEP, TOTAL_MINUTES_IN_BED, REM_MINUTES, LIGHT_MINUTES, DEEP_MINUTES, WAKE_MINUTES) VALUES ('${DIARY_DAY}', ${TOTAL_MINUTES_ASLEEP}, ${TOTAL_MINUTES_IN_BED}, ${REM_MINUTES}, ${LIGHT_MINUTES}, ${DEEP_MINUTES}, ${WAKE_MINUTES}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TOTAL_MINUTES_ASLEEP = ${TOTAL_MINUTES_ASLEEP}, TOTAL_MINUTES_IN_BED = ${TOTAL_MINUTES_IN_BED}, REM_MINUTES = ${REM_MINUTES}, LIGHT_MINUTES = ${LIGHT_MINUTES}, DEEP_MINUTES = ${DEEP_MINUTES}, WAKE_MINUTES = ${WAKE_MINUTES}

entry.value: INSERT INTO HEALTH_HISTORY (DIARY_DAY, TOTAL_CALORIES_OUT, TOTAL_MINUTES_RECORDED, STEPS, ELEVATION, AVG_REST_HR, REST_MINUTES, REST_CAL_OUT, AVG_FAT_BURN_HR, FAT_BURN_MINUTES, FAT_BURN_CAL_OUT, AVG_CARDIO_HR, CARDIO_MINUTES, CARDIO_CAL_OUT, AVG_PEAK_HR, PEAK_MINUTES, PEAK_CAL_OUT, REST_HR) VALUES ('${DIARY_DAY}', ${TOTAL_CALORIES_OUT}, ${TOTAL_MINUTES_RECORDED}, ${STEPS}, ${ELEVATION}, ${AVG_REST_HR}, ${REST_MINS}, ${REST_CAL_OUT}, ${AVG_FAT_BURN_HR}, ${FAT_BURN_MINS}, ${FAT_BURN_CAL_OUT}, ${AVG_CARDIO_HR}, ${CARDIO_MINS}, ${CARDIO_CAL_OUT}, ${AVG_PEAK_HR}, ${PEAK_MINS}, ${PEAK_CAL_OUT}, ${REST_HR}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TOTAL_CALORIES_OUT = ${TOTAL_CALORIES_OUT}, TOTAL_MINUTES_RECORDED = ${TOTAL_MINUTES_RECORDED}, STEPS = ${STEPS}, ELEVATION = ${ELEVATION}, AVG_REST_HR = ${AVG_REST_HR}, REST_MINUTES = ${REST_MINS}, REST_CAL_OUT = ${REST_CAL_OUT}, AVG_FAT_BURN_HR = ${AVG_FAT_BURN_HR}, FAT_BURN_MINUTES = ${FAT_BURN_MINS}, FAT_BURN_CAL_OUT = ${FAT_BURN_CAL_OUT}, AVG_CARDIO_HR = ${AVG_CARDIO_HR}, CARDIO_MINUTES = ${CARDIO_MINS}, CARDIO_CAL_OUT = ${CARDIO_CAL_OUT}, AVG_PEAK_HR = ${AVG_PEAK_HR}, PEAK_MINUTES = ${PEAK_MINS}, PEAK_CAL_OUT = ${PEAK_CAL_OUT}, REST_HR = ${REST_HR}

labels.label: Survey folder for new CSV Files

entry.value: INSERT INTO NUTRITION_HISTORY (DIARY_DAY, MEAL, TOTAL_CALORIES_IN, CARB, PROT, FAT) VALUES ('${diary_day}', '${meal}', ${total_calories_in}, ${carb}, ${prot}, ${fat}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TOTAL_CALORIES_IN = ${total_calories_in}, CARB = ${carb}, PROT = ${prot}, FAT = ${fat}

entry.value: select IFNULL(max(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(START_TIME)),1535760000) as START_TIME, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) as NOW, 1609.344 as MILES_IN_METERS from ACTIVITY_HISTORY

INSERT INTO activity_history (ID, START_TIME, DURATION, DISTANCE, ELEVATION_GAIN, AVG_HR, AVG_PACE) VALUES (${ID}, '${START_TIME}', ${DURATION}, ${DISTANCE}, ${ELEVATION_GAIN}, ${AVG_HR}, ${AVG_PACE}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE START_TIME = '${START_TIME}', DURATION = ${DURATION}, DISTANCE = ${DISTANCE}, ELEVATION_GAIN = ${ELEVATION_GAIN}, AVG_HR = ${AVG_HR}, AVG_PACE = ${AVG_PACE}
